praqjApa#ti-rakAmayatAnnAqdaH syAqmitiq sa Eqta(gm) sa#ptadaSarAqtra-ma#paSyaqt tamA&ha#raqt tEnA#yajataq tatOq vai sO$&nnAqdO#&Bavaqdya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#H saptadaSa-rAqtramAsa#tE &nnAqdA Eqva Ba#vanti pa~jcAqhO Ba#vatiq pa~jcaq vA Ruqtava#H saM~Mvathsaqra RuqtuShvEqva sa#M~MvathsaqrE prati# tiShThaqntyathOq pa~jcA$kSharA 
paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvA&va# rundhaqtE &sa#traqM ~MvA Eqta- [  ] 20
